Guys!  Need some help here. First time I run into a dilemma like this.   I've downloaded a packed file, I've tried to unpack it, but it's pasword protected. What to do?

3dGreek wrote"Yet another rar'd file...who's gonna bother seeding a rar'd file once they extract it...nugget"  

 Once you "extract" the movie from the .rar files you now have the movie and the rar files.  So you can convert or transcode and burn the movie file and then delete it while still having the .rar files to seed with.  You seemed to be saying the .rar files would be empty.  Or maybe you just don't think anybody would seed after they had the movie file, but that makes no sense because non-.rar files are used for seeding all the time.  Not as much as they should be, but that's the same with all files.

I seed no matter what format the downloaded file was in.
WTF!? Did anyone get a good copy, this movie does not have a bad ending, it has NO ending. Thanx a bunch, and merry Xmas! :(
